params.text:
Implement proper imports inside Viua VM

The new import functionality needs explicit support on the VM's side.
Without it we will be forced to either write highly unelegant code and
import modules manually using special shim modules written in assembly.
I guess nobody wants to do that...

On the Viua VM's side, the relevant issues is
0f8c916c2499aab93cf8c55cc1fd6bbf354bd34d.
